text: Radim Vlasák (born 5 January 1974) is a retired Czech football player who played in the Czech First League for FC Boby Brno and FK Teplice. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Czech footballers Category:Czech Republic under-21 international footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Czech First League players Category:FC Zbrojovka Brno players Category:FK Teplice players
title: Radim Vlasák
